Articles.Content:
More Prune Lists is a prune list pack created by ebigunso, for the ever-awesome [AutoPruner](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/91365) by Felger.

The default lists included with AutoPruner was getting old and outdated, so I decided to go and create my own fix for it. Now that it's up and running, why not share it with everybody out there?

That is how this came to be here.

[Download Link](https://github.com/ebigunso/More-Prune-Lists/releases)

[source](https://github.com/ebigunso/More-Prune-Lists)

=========

Change log:

v1.0.1

- Added ExtraplanetaryLaunchpads UKS integration

v1.0 Initial Release

- Added KW\_SRB
- Added Stock\_Fairings
- Added Stock\_HeatShield
- Added Stock\_ShuttleWings
- Fixed Stock\_Tanks from AutoPruner
- Fixed Stock\_Wings from AutoPruner
- Fixed RO\_Global\_Fairing from AutoPruner
- Fixed RO\_Global\_Tanks from AutoPruner

=========

License: [CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0 International Public License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-30T18:11:13Z" title="11/30/2015 06:11  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 30, 2015</time> by ebigunso**
This is great! One of those things that's been on the back burner for me for a long while after I moved my KSP to my Linux partition.

I'm glad I can be of help ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Forgive me for the poor coding style, I haven't even touched coding very much until now.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T16:32:23Z" title="07/27/2015 04:32  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by ebigunso**
Just a heads up since I have updated this mod and added a new list ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Just a heads up since I have updated this mod and added a new list ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks
I love AutoPruner, but compiling prune lists is a very tedious task. Thank you very much for taking on this burden so others don't have to!

Here is a .prnl which will delete the repulsors and roverbody from KerbalFoundies:

    # KerbalFoundries# Get rid of the repulsorsKerbalFoundries/Parts/RepulsorKerbalFoundries/Parts/Screw.cfgKerbalFoundries/Parts/RoverBody.cfgKerbalFoundries/Assets/RepulsorKerbalFoundries/Assets/RepulsorGimbalKerbalFoundries/Assets/RepulsorSurfaceKerbalFoundries/Assets/RoverBodyKerbalFoundries/Assets/ScrewKerbalFoundries/Assets/DiffuseMap2048KerbalFoundries/Assets/RepulsorDiffuse.pngKerbalFoundries/Assets/RepulsorGimbal.pngKerbalFoundries/Assets/dirty
